topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5548734e63687263ad661000#post_5548734e63687263ad661000
"You can get it here":http://digitalcybercherries.com/

You can customize it using ROMs on your hard drive. (Works with MAME, NES, SNES, Genesis, And Game boy ROMs)

You can also add custom music for the boom box. Add custom images to the posters in the arcade.

And you can play darts and bowling and stuff.

It's real nice.
